description: Defines the CartItem class representing an item in a shopping cart, including total price calculations and formatted output.

classes.name: CartItem
classes.description: Represents an item in a shopping cart with associated book and quantity, capable of calculating total price and formatted total string.

methods.name: totalCents
methods.description: Calculates the total price in cents for this cart item.

methods.name: totalFormatted
methods.description: Returns a formatted string of the total price, currency specific.
